definition[0]: a lucky or successful situation where people can make a lot of money
example[0]: 2008 was a bonanza year for the oil industry.
definition[1]: a US television show first made in the 1960s, which continued for many years. It is about a family who live in the Wild West on a ranch (=large farm) called the ‘Ponderosa’. The music that is played at the beginning is famous.
definition[2]: a lucky or successful situation in which a person or business makes a lot of money
example[2]: a £5 million export sales bonanza in the United States
example[3]: a bonanza year for the computer industry
